description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
Has decent damage output and accuracy.
Has slow fire rate and high damage output.
Fully automatic SMG with high fire rate but low accuracy.
Semi-automatic pistol with decent damage output and accuracy. Can be fired as fast as you can pull the trigger.
A high capacity experimental beam rifle.
Heavy break-action rifle. Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.
Single-action pistol with a built-in silencer. Great for stealth, but tricky in combat.
Fires explosive projectiles that only detonate when hitting ARC.
Pump-action shotgun with large bullet spread, sharp falloff, and high damage output.
A bolt-action sniper rifle with exceptional damage output and accuracy, but slow handling.
Semi-automatic assault rifle. Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time reload.
A scoped bolt-action sniper rifle with reliable damage output and accuracy.
Fully automatic assault rifle. A cheap offensive option, but has to be reloaded 2 bullets at a time.
Lever-action battle rifle with high damage output, accuracy, and headshot damage.
Full automatic SMG. Deals good damage, but has quite a low fire-rate and can be hard to control.
Fully automatic assault rifle with moderate fire rate and accuracy.
Has large ammo capacity, but is only accurate while crouched.
Semi-automatic pistol. Fires two shots at a time.
Semi-automatic shotgun with good bullet spread but sharp falloff.
